title: Nisha Katona's Home Kitchen
overview: Nisha will prepare some of her favourite recipes at her home using ingredients from local suppliers and her own garden. She shares her home with family, their three dogs, four horses, four goats and assorted ducks, chickens, guinea fowl and alpacas, and viewers will be immersed in the laughter, visits from friends (some furry) as Nisha shares recipes for simple but delicious dishes.
